original_text: Their horses were seven hundred thirty and six; their mules, two hundred forty and five;

sentences.original_text: Their horses were seven hundred thirty and six
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 말은 일곱 백 서른 여섯 마리였고

sentences.original_text: their mules, two hundred forty and five
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 노새는 이백 마리 다섯 마리였다
